comments.html:
I am wondering how much Nicira would impact the network appliance business (ADC, firewalls, security gateways, etc...)
Theoricallly, Nicira could trigger their transformation into basic silicon chip foundries :-D
Or give the business hand to new players in the data path only...

Or is that just apply to router/switch?
comments.name: David Le Goff

comments.html: From the NVP solutions white paper: "First, and most widely deployed is OVS in the server hypervisor, a complete software solution that works with .. ESX." How?
